title: This movie was difficult for me
review: I watched this movie for almost 2 days. It is quite difficult to understand and to perceive. However, it is worth reviewing

title: This movie was special to me
review: For me, this cartoon is one of those cartoons worth watching in life. Since I'm not a kid any more, but something has remained in my mind since that time, that is why this movie was special to me.

title: It was wonderful
review: This cartoon is wonderful. I cried almost all the time. This cartoon is about real life, true emotions and dreams.
